Welcome to affspec’s documentation!¶

Easy Usage¶

class pipeline.Process(weight_loc, cuda_id=0)[source]¶

Set up as session (aka process) to serve the CNN model.

Parameters

weight_loc (str) – the default location for the model weights

pipeline.detect_face(img)[source]¶

img is get from cv2.imread()

Parameters

img (numpy.array) – the input image

Returns

top, right, bottom, left

Return type

t, r, b, l (int)

pipeline.img2torch(img)[source]¶

Detect and crop the face, and then convert the largest face to PyTorch tensor

Parameters

img (numpy.array) – the input image as the numpy array with [h, w, 3] size.

Returns

the input image as PyTorch object with [3, 224, 224] size.

Return type

img (torch.Tensor)

realtime.process_csv(csv_name, skip_if_exists=True)[source]¶

Process a CSV file

Args: csv_name (str): file path for the csv file skip_if_exists (bool): if set True, then it will skip processing the already processed images

Returns: None (None): nothing
